offer_summary.job_description: This is an engineering leadership role with responsibility for implementing the technology strategy and execution for our digital platforms (e-commerce) that align with our product strategy and meet our business goals. The position requires a deep understanding of modern technology stack, agile delivery models, customer experience focus, and proven accomplishment in software development.
requirements: [10+ years' experience working in software development]
[Proven track record of building technology development teams is mandatory]

[Broad understanding of IT principles, frameworks and methodologies including TOGAF, Agile, Scrum, DevOps, ITIL with extensive experience planning and managing complex technology projects utilizing these methodologies]
[Comprehensive understanding of cloud technologies, AWS a must]
[Experience across JavaScript frontend technologies, SAP Hybris and Commerce tools]
[10+ years working in complex eCommerce organisations]
[A passion for innovation, technology, and digital transformation]
requiered_skills: [Strong leadership capability demonstrated through previous experience leading IT teams]
benefits: [Sharing the costs of professional training & courses]
